description: Jessy possesses 10 ancient manuscript pages. She can choose to send some or all pages to Bob, a historian, for transcription. Transcription increases the value of each page threefold. Bob then decides how many transcribed pages to return to Jessy.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of transcribed pages to keeper
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of transcribed pages to keeper
